name: Pipe Dream (itch) (TinyGoose)
description:
Pipe Dream 🚀

A tiny racing/flying game, part of a series of 12 monthly games to be released throughout 2019! Made in a couple of weeks.

Fly through a neon-coloured tunnel, avoiding the obstacles and finishing in the fastest time known to man to place on the highscore board in Arcade Mode, or join up to 3 other local players in Race Mode and see who is the quickest!

Controls

Move up/down/left/right: Left analogue stick

Roll (rotate on axis): Right analogue stick left/right

Thrust: Right trigger/R2 button

Airbrake: Left trigger/L2 button

Price

Would recommend downloading for free; it's only a quick prototype. Don't feel bad! However any donations would be very much appreciated and will win you a credit in future projects ;)

Special Thanks

Max Chapman, Katie Coughlan, Hayley Osborn, and anyone else who has supported me along the way 😄
